description: Hattori`s Butler was sent to find A-class Pokémon Sommelier Cilan as his employer Hattori, a notable man in Nearby Town, was seeking excellent Pokémon Sommeliers and he wanted Cilan to come for a visit. He took Cilan and his friends to Hattori mansion and then introduced them to Hattori. When Burgundy attempted to show up at the mansion, he made sure he wouldn`t let her in as she was a C-class Pokémon Sommelier. He also officiated as the referee of Cilan and Pinot Noir Pokémon battle.
name: Hattori no Shitsuji
